reviews.title: Stylish bed and breakfast
reviews.text: This is a beautiful guest house with extremely helpful hosts (a mother and daughter who are new to the area). As we were staying on Dec 23 and Dec 24 they emailed us in advance to suggest restaurants, which they then booked for us. Both were excellent (Annie's Kitchen and the Quayside Cabin).

reviews.title: Lovely guesthouse
reviews.text: They also got up very early on Christmas Day to provide breakfast for us as we had a flight to catch. This was an unexpected and welcome gesture.

reviews.title: Whales from your bedroom window
reviews.text: There are fantastic views from the terrace and public rooms, but most bedrooms don't have views. We stayed in the Penthouse which has two bedrooms, a lounge and a terrace and was great for the four of us (with the added bonus of lots of sport on the satellite TV for our teenage kids).

reviews.title: Pelagus for whale watching
reviews.text: The hosts are clearly desperate to please the guests but are new to the job and their nervousness shows. As their confidence grows the place should take on a more relaxed atmosphere.
